Subskills.name: Earth's Pull
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by gravitation slam.

Subskills.name: Astral Chaos
Subskills.description: Gravitation slam executes monsters below a threshold.

Subskills.name: Void Slam
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius pulling monsters towards the center of mass on hit inflicting shadow burning. Gravitation slam now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Shaken With Magic
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Gravity at Will
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using gravitation slam.

Subskills.name: Floating Range
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of gravitation slam.

Subskills.name: Self-help
Subskills.description: Chance to knock monsters into air on hit dealing a portion of their life as additional damage.

Subskills.name: Stunned by Force
Subskills.description: Chance to stun targets on hit.

Subskills.name: Antigravity Slam
Subskills.description: Knock monsters back from the center of impact with force unleashing homing void souls seeking nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Gravitational Radius
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum cast range of gravitation slam.

Subskills.name: Deep Slam
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit dealing increased damage equal to your arcane skill damage.

Subskills.name: Force of Gravity
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Gravitation Wave
Subskills.description: Unleash a shockwave of gravitation slams towards target direction with increased radius.

Subskills.name: Dimensional Slam
Subskills.description: Smash monsters into a black hole causing them to re-appear from an additional white hole knocked up dealing increased area of effect damage when landing.
